K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-9: nyin dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-10: rtag tu nad 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-11: lus 'di ngan skyugs dang ni mchil mas gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-12: bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon par gtses //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-13: mkhas pa su zhig lus la sred pa skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-14: lus ni sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-15: gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gso //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-16: lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-17: de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-18: lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sa ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-19: lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-20: 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-21: de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-22: zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-23: lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-24: brtan pa byas kyang 'jig pa 'gyur yin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-25: 'di la 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-26: bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349a-27: thub pa 'byung 'di khyod kyis rnyed pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-0: sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dad pa @349b bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-1: shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-2: lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-3: des kyang chags pa yongs su spang bya na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-4: su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-5: de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-6: ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-7: mir rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-8: gzhon tshe rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-9: nor btsal bde ba myong ba bya zhes zer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-10: nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-11: bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-12: de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-13: ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-14: longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-15: 'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-16: skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-17: mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-18: sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lta dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-19: dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-20: longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'dring //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-21: de ltar log pa 'tshol zhing byis pa 'khyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-22: sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-23: lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-24: rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag phrogs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-25: de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-26: bu dang chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:349b-27: rgyal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-2: mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-3: rtag tu brnab cing longs spyod tshol byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-4: de ni pha dang ma la mi gus shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-5: bu dang chung ma la yang mi byams par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-6: de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-7: bdag gi longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-8: brnab mo byas gzo nam yang rnyed mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-9: g-yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams tshol byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-10: brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-11: sems can brnab mo g-yo ldan 'drid pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-12: yid bzhin sems la tshig gis dga' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-13: yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-14: 'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-15: sems can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-16: sman dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-17: smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-18: khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-19: brnab mo dag la mdza' bo nam yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-20: nye du med cing snying slebs grogs kyang med;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-21: 'on kyang de dag nor phyir ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-22: skye bo brnab la mkhas pas yid mi rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-23: brnab mo longs spyod ched du bya min byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-24: shin tu mi zad sems ni kun du bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-25: de phyir mkhas pa yang dag rtogs byas la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-26: ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350a-27: gser dang mu tig nor bu byi ru dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-0: las dges de dag lbu ba las @350b kyang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-1: de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-2: de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-3: byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni byung ba'i tshe; ;sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-5: de yi tshe na de ni ga las 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-6: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byung bas ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-7: rdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul byed rmongs par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-8: dper na so ga'i nyi ma'i gung dus na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-9: smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-10: bskal pa gcig lon nas ni 'jig rten 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-11: nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-12: lhun po dag kyang tshig cing rnam par 'jig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-13: de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-14: chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-16: de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-17: mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-18: mkhas pa su zhig blo yi stobs ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-19: de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-20: 'di la ro myong byed pa su yod na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-21: de dag ci yi phyir ni spong mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-22: 'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-23: bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-24: shin tu sdug bsngal gyur ba de dus na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-25: bu dang chung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-26: ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:350b-27: bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-2: de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-3: mya ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag blangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-4: 'di na de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-5: srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-6: de bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lag med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-7: pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-8: bran dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-9: shi ba'i gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-10: las rnams rjes su 'brang zhing byis pa 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-11: las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-12: las kyis gnas pa 'jig rten rnam par rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-13: skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid reg gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-14: mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-15: mnar med song tshe de dag skyabs min pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-16: pha ma spun dang snying sdug bu rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-17: rtsa lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-18: de dag ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-19: las de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-20: rab tu mi bzad 'jigs las mi mi grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-21: de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-22: bsgrims te sdig pa yongs su spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-23: ji ltar las rnams byas pa ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-24: gshin rje dang ni gshin rje'i rang rta dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-25: mdza' bshes dag dang rtsa lag tshogs dang spun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-26: pha ma bu dang chung ma srung mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-27: khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thob gyur la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351a-28: thob nas sdig pa spangs pa ma byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-0: @351b kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-1: 'di ni mi dge las kyi rnam smin yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-2: las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-3: khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-4: 'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-5: de las chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-6: rang gis las byas rang la rnam par smin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-7: rang gis las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-8: ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod las byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-9: sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-10: de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-11: sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-12: legs pa'i las byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-13: de ltar khyim ni yongs su spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-14: kho sgo dbyug pa ltung gi chad pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-15: su zhig spong 'dod zhi ba don gnyer bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-16: khyim la 'jigs par gyis te spang byos la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-17: 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-18: khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsva //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-19: sems la 'byung ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-20: me mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-21: mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-22: khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-23: khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-24: nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-25: de ltas khyim ni rab tu spang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-26: 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:351b-27: ma btab ma rmos bde dang yid bde'i rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-0: sdug bsngal mang mo'i rtsa ba khyim @352a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-2: blun po dga' yi mkhas pa gzhar mi dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-3: pags pa chu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-4: 'di ni nga yi chung ma 'du shes bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-5: byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags skyed par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-6: bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-7: shes rab ldan pa khyim gyi nyes rig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-8: de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-9: chos la sman gyi 'du shes bzhag byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-10: ma chags khyim nas myur du 'byung bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-11: de nas khyim bdag dpa' byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-12: khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-13: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-14: de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-15: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-16: sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-17: gang dag gis ni sems bskyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-18: kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-19: 'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-20: byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-21: sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-22: sems 'dir su dag dga' bskyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-24: sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-25: sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-26: de dag sems can thams cad dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-27: de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-28: byang chub sems la su dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352a-29: de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-0: mtshan gyis @352b shin tu spras pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-2: byang chub sems ni sems che ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-3: sems kun nang na dge ba mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-4: yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-5: nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-6: sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-7: byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-8: 'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-9: byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-10: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-11: de la gal te gzugs mchis na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-12: nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-13: de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-14: gangg'a'i bye ma grangs snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-15: sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-16: rin chen dag gis rab bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-17: 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-18: gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-19: byang chub tu ni sems btud na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-21: de la mtha' ni ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-22: byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-23: drang srong mchog gis bstan mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-24: de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-25: dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-26: sman gyi dam pa nad ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-27: byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-28: nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-29: sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-30: me gsum dag gis gdungs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-31: sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-32: bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-33: mkhas rnams skyo bar yong mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:352b-34: gang dag byang chub spyad spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-0: @353a *// dpa' bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-1: de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-2: skyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-3: dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-4: 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-5: sems de 'dor bar mi bgyid cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-6: de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-7: sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-8: sh'akya seng ge mi yi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-10: bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-15: kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-22: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-23: 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med dag khyab par byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-24: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-25: nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar log ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-26: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-28: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-29: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353a-30: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-0: bcom @353b ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-1: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-4: rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-5: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-7: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-8: rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal ba mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-9: sangs rgyas skyob pa 'dzum pa mi ston na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-10: ci slad bcom ldan khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-11: 'jig rten phan dgongs thugs brtse bdag la gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-12: khyod kyis ci slad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-13: bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-14: dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par mdzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-15: 'jig rten ldongs la myur du mig kyang stsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-16: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-19: khyod kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:353b-28: khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-0: @354a *// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-1: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-3: khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa; dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-4: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-5: khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-6: nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-7: phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-8: mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-9: thugs byung bar mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-14: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-15: thugs byung bar mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-23: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354a-24: de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lda na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @354b pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-3: kye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-10: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-14: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-15: dpa' byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-19: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-20: khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-24: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-26: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-27: khyim bdag dpa' byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:354b-28: 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:355a-0: @355a *// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:355a-2: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-010:355a-3: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
